definition: During the latter part of the day, specifically referring to the time period between noon and evening. It is commonly employed to indicate a specific time frame or to schedule activities occurring in the afternoon.

examples.german: Ich treffe mich nachmittags mit Freunden.
examples.english: I meet up with friends in the afternoon.

examples.german: Nachmittags trinke ich gerne eine Tasse Kaffee.
examples.english: In the afternoon, I like to have a cup of coffee.
I often go for a walk in the afternoon.

examples.german: Nachmittags habe ich immer viel zu tun.
examples.english: I always have a lot to do in the afternoon.

examples.german: Nachmittags nehme ich mir Zeit zum Lesen.
examples.english: In the afternoon, I take time to read.
